title: Siete esqueletos decapitados
description: The first installment in a series of chilling horror novels set in Mexico City, Siete esqueletos decapitados introduces kidnapper Nicte, Lieutenant Guillén, and Sergio, a young man who quickly discovers that in order to solve the increasing numbers of vile murders in town, he must face true terror. He begins to understand his destiny, which ultimately saves his own life.
author: Antonio Malpica
